name: PetahChristian.GitHub.io
tagline: but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us. (Romans 5:8 ESV)
body:
### Lion and Lamb - Admiring Jesus Christ

The Lion and Lamb app creates word clouds using the most frequent words from a chosen book of the Bible. The larger the word appears in the cloud, the more often it occurs in the Bible.

- [Download the free Lion and Lamb app](https://itunes.apple.com/app/lion-lamb-admiring-jesus-christ/id1018992236?mt=8&at=1010l3f4) from the App Store.

### Names of God from The Bible

The Names of God app lists over two hundred names of God from The Bible, and includes compound names for God.

- [Download the free Names of God app](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/names-of-god-from-the-bible/id860449184?mt=8&at=1010l3f4) from the App Store.

### The Messiah - Bible Prophecies about Jesus Christ

The Messiah app includes over 150 bible prophecies about Jesus Christ, Son of God, Savior, written centuries before He was born.

- [Download the free Messiah app](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/messiah-bible-prophecies-about/id951349672?mt=8&at=1010l3f4) from the App Store.

### Composite Gospel - The life of Jesus

The Composite Gospel app combines the four Gospel accounts of the life of Jesus into a single unified view.

- [Download the free Composite Gospel app](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/composite-gospel-life-jesus/id967907349?mt=8&at=1010l3f4) from the App Store.

### Comments or questions about the apps?

Feel free to get in touch with me via [twitter](https://twitter.com/BibleMemoryApp) or [email](BibleMemoryApp@gmail.com), or open an issue regarding any open source projects (@PetahChristian).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
